description: Master the art of momentum in this high-speed precision platformer challenge.
rationale: This app targets AI agents and developers interested in momentum-based physics and precise timing. It bridges the gap between simple jumping and complex platforming by focusing on horizontal velocity management and obstacle avoidance, providing a rich environment for reinforcement learning.
details: The game is a simplified 2D side-scrolling platformer. The player controls a character on a 1D horizontal plane with vertical jumping capabilities. Key features include: 1) Gravity physics with acceleration and terminal velocity. 2) Variable jump height based on key-press duration. 3) Running momentum where horizontal speed increases over time. 4) Environmental hazards: Bottomless pits and stationary spikes. 5) Success condition: Reaching the goal post at the far right of the level. The game state is represented by a grid-based coordinate system for easy parsing by AI agents.

technical_specs.observation_space: Player (x, y, vx, vy), Nearest Obstacle (x, y), Distance to Goal

how_to_build: uv venv && uv pip install pygame
how_to_stop: kill -9 $(pgrep -f main.py) or press ESC in the window
how_to_play: Goal: Reach the goal post at the right end of the map. Scoring: Points awarded for distance traveled and a large bonus for reaching the goal. Penalty: Falling into pits or hitting spikes resets the level and deducts score. Controls: Left/Right Arrow keys for movement, Spacebar to jump (hold for higher jump).
